resources.string: You must fill up these correctly including profile picture now or else you will be considered as an outsider \nand the app will crush when you try to do an activity

Hi, I am Zianur Rahman Joy, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, 17 Series, RUET. 
The basic idea of this app was part of my project in 2nd year odd semester under Bayezid Islam Sir, Lecturer, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, RUET.
Bayezid Sir really helped me to build my basic by guiding me properly thoroughout that project period and i am very grateful to him for that.
After that i kept on working on it. While passing through a lot of change in idea the app turned into this. 
I was supported mentally by many well wisher while making this app. I am grateful to them also. 
The idea behind this app was to help all Ruetian. I hope everyone will enjoy operating this app. 

Thank You.
We will send you an Email to let you change your password
